title: Haunted Doll Factory Adventure #1
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Abandoned Factory Floor
rooms.description: A vast, dusty factory floor filled with rusted machinery and conveyor belts. Broken porcelain doll parts litter the ground. Cobwebs hang from the ceiling, and moonlight streams through shattered windows. The air is thick with the smell of decay and old paint. Shadows seem to move in the corners of your vision.

items.name: old workbench
items.description: A wooden workbench covered in dust and doll-making tools

items.name: rusty screwdriver
items.description: A corroded screwdriver that could pry open weak locks

items.name: metal filing cabinet
items.description: A dented filing cabinet with three drawers, covered in rust

items.name: faded factory notice
items.description: A yellowed notice posted on official letterhead
items.text: NOTICE: Blackwood Doll Factory - Est. 1952. Owner: Mr. Edgar Blackwood. All employees must report to the Assembly Room for safety training. Remember: the dolls are stored in the warehouse, and Mr. Blackwood's office is on the second floor.

items.name: tarnished brass key
items.description: An old brass key with 'SUPPLY' engraved on it

items.name: locked supply cabinet
items.description: A tall metal cabinet with a brass lock

items.name: employee's journal
items.description: A leather-bound journal belonging to a former worker
items.text: Last Entry: Something is wrong with the dolls. They move when no one is watching. Mr. Blackwood has locked himself in his office. The only way out is through the loading dock, but you need the manager's key from his office upstairs.

items.name: broken conveyor belt
items.description: A rusted conveyor belt with doll parts scattered along it

items.name: cracked porcelain doll head
items.description: A disturbing doll head with one eye missing and a cracked smile

items.name: door to assembly room
items.description: A heavy wooden door leading east to the Assembly Room

rooms.name: Doll Assembly Room
rooms.description: A cramped room filled with assembly stations and shelves of doll parts. Dozens of unfinished dolls sit on the tables, their empty eye sockets seeming to follow your movements. Paint cans and brushes are scattered everywhere. A staircase leads up to the manager's office. The walls are covered with instruction posters and safety warnings.

items.name: assembly instruction poster
items.description: A poster showing the doll assembly process
items.text: ASSEMBLY INSTRUCTIONS: Step 1 - Attach head to body. Step 2 - Insert glass eyes. Step 3 - Paint facial features. Step 4 - Add clothing. All completed dolls must be moved to the warehouse for storage.

items.name: safety warning poster
items.description: A faded safety poster with important warnings
items.text: SAFETY FIRST! In case of emergency, exit through the loading dock. Manager Edgar Blackwood is responsible for all safety protocols. Report all incidents to the office immediately.

items.name: paint storage cabinet
items.description: A cabinet filled with old paint cans and supplies

items.name: hidden note
items.description: A crumpled note stuffed behind paint cans
items.text: I've hidden the spare office key in the toolbox on the assembly table. The combination is the year this cursed factory opened. - E.B.

items.name: main assembly table
items.description: A large table covered with doll parts and a locked toolbox

items.name: office key
items.description: A small silver key labeled 'MANAGER OFFICE'

items.name: shelf of completed dolls
items.description: A shelf displaying finished dolls with glassy eyes that seem to watch you

items.name: staircase to office
items.description: A narrow wooden staircase leading up to the manager's office. The door at the top has a keyhole.

rooms.name: Manager's Office
rooms.description: A small, claustrophobic office overlooking the factory floor. The desk is covered with papers and ledgers. A large portrait of Edgar Blackwood hangs on the wall, his painted eyes seeming to follow you. File cabinets line one wall, and a locked safe sits in the corner. A window shows the loading dock below.

items.name: manager's desk
items.description: A cluttered oak desk with papers and a locked drawer

items.name: safe combination note
items.description: A note with instructions for opening the safe
items.text: SAFE ACCESS: To open the safe, answer the security questions correctly. Q1: What is the factory name? Q2: Where are finished dolls stored? Q3: Who owns this factory?

items.name: portrait of Edgar Blackwood
items.description: An oil painting of a stern man in a suit
items.text: Portrait of Edgar Blackwood, Factory Owner. His nameplate reads: 'Edgar Blackwood - Proprietor of Blackwood Doll Factory since 1952'

items.name: accounting ledger
items.description: A thick book with financial records
items.text: Blackwood Doll Factory - Financial Records. Warehouse inventory shows 500 completed dolls in storage. All products shipped from loading dock.

items.name: wall safe
items.description: A heavy safe built into the wall with a digital keypad displaying three security questions

password_questions.question: What is the factory name?
password_questions.hint: Check the factory notice and the portrait

password_questions.question: Where are finished dolls stored?
password_questions.hint: Look at the instruction poster and the ledger

password_questions.question: Who owns this factory?
password_questions.hint: The portrait and notices mention the owner's name

items.name: loading dock key
items.description: A heavy iron key labeled 'LOADING DOCK EXIT'

items.name: window overlooking loading dock
items.description: A window with a fire escape ladder leading down to the loading dock

rooms.name: Loading Dock
rooms.description: You've made it to the loading dock! The large bay doors are open, revealing the night sky and freedom beyond. Fresh air rushes in, dispelling the oppressive atmosphere of the factory. An old delivery truck sits waiting, its engine still running. Behind you, the factory looms dark and silent.

items.name: old delivery truck
items.description: A vintage truck with 'Blackwood Dolls' painted on the side, engine idling

items.name: open bay doors
items.description: Large doors opening to the outside world and freedom

rooms.win_message: You've escaped the Haunted Doll Factory! As you climb into the delivery truck and drive away, you glance in the rearview mirror. For just a moment, you see dozens of porcelain faces watching from the factory windows. You floor the accelerator and never look back. You win!
